		boolean space=true;

		int ch;
		int no=0;
		while((ch = fis.read())!=-1)
		{
		   if(Character.isLetter((char)(ch)))
		   {
			   if(Character.isUpperCase((char)ch)) {
				   ch = Character.toLowerCase((char)ch);
				   
			   }

		}
